>Find the current transfer function T_I(s) = I_2(s)/I_1(s) in Figure P11–13. Select values of R and L so that T_I(s) has a pole at s = - 377 rad/s

Dette er en std. strømdeler.

Derfor gælder:

$$ 
T_I(s) = \frac{I_2(s)}{I_1(s)} = \frac{Y_2(s)}{Y_1(s)+Y_2(s)}
$$

Hvor:
$$ 
Y_1 = \frac{1}{R} \quad \frac{1}{Y_2 = Ls + 2R}
$$

Dette giver: 

$$ 
\frac{I_2(s)}{I_1(s)} = \frac{\frac{1}{Y_2 = Ls + 2R}}{\frac{1}{R}+\frac{1}{Y_2 = Ls + 2R}}
$$

En omskrivning giver: 

$$ 
\frac{Y_2(s)}{Y_1(s)+Y_2(s)} = \frac{Z_1(s)}{Z_1(s)+Z_2(s)}
$$

Derfor:

$$ 
T_I(s)= \frac{R}{3R+Ls} = \frac{\frac{R}{L}}{\frac{3R}{L}+s}
$$

Dette giver en pol i $-\frac{3R}{L}\;\mathrm{rad/s}$.

#### Polen i -377...

Der vælges en modstand: $4k7\Omega$.

Derfor:

$-377 = -\frac{3\cdot 4k7}{L} \to L =\frac{3 \dot 4k7}{377} = 37.4 \;\mathrm{H}$

$$
T_I(s)= \frac{\frac{4k7\Omega}{37.4\;\mathrm{H}}}{\frac{3\cdot4k7\Omega}{37.4\;\mathrm{H}}+s}
$$
